thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 34 of 605
thread.title: Katie Polatty

author: Katie Polatty
title: Katie Polatty
text: Every time I have ordered something from Fabletics I am nothing but satisfied. There has only been one time where something did not fit. The fabric is so durable and lasts SO long. I started buying my workout clothes from Fabletics 2 years ago and I still have leggings and shirts that I have ordered that look like they were purchased yesterday. The outfits chosen for me are always spot on and meet my expectations. I will continue buying from Fabletics forever!
